sen.j: 名のり・注連縄切り・火祭り（なのり・しめなわきり・ひまつり）は、三重県志摩市大王町で大晦日から元日にかけて行なわれる一連の年中行事。
sen.e: nanori, Shimenawa-kiri, himatsuri is a series of annual events held from New Year's Eve through New Year's Day in Daio-cho, Shima City, Mie Prefecture.
"Nanori, Shimenawa-kiri, Himatsuri" is a series of annual events held from New Year's Eve through New Year's Day in Daio-cho, Shima City, Mie Prefecture.
sen.cmt: nanori を Nanori に、himatsuri を Himatsuri にそれぞれ修正しました。
sen.e: "Nanori, Shimenawa-kiri, Himatsuri" is a series of annual events held from New Year's Eve through New Year's Day in Daio-cho, Shima City, Mie Prefecture.

tit.cmt: nanori を Nanori に修正しました。

sen.j: 大晦日の夜、志摩の国漁協波切支所にて複数の名のり船頭と中学生以下子供達が集まり、伊勢音頭を歌って行事が始まる（この時の伊勢音頭は当地にアレンジされているものである）。
sen.e: On the night of New Year's Eve, several Nanori-sendo boatmen and junior high school children and younger gather in the Namikiri branch of the Shimano-kuni fisheries cooperative association and the event starts with the Ise Dance song (the song played at the moment is the one arranged locally).
sen.cmt: 志摩の国漁協→Shimano-kuni fisheries cooperative association [http://www.ide.go.jp/English/Publish/Download/Vrf/pdf/433.pdf]

sen.cmt: junior high school children を children of junior high school students に修正しました。

sen.j: この後子供たちは樽と俵を手に持ち、赤い半被を着て「出口大明神」の札が書かれた提灯を持つ船頭に付き添われ、各地区に分かれて家々を回る。
sen.e: After that, children who hold barrels and bales break up into groups and go door-to-door in respective area, accompanied by Nanori-sendo boatmen wearing a red livery coat with a chochin (Japanese paper lantern) labeled as Deguchi-daimyojin.

sen.j: 「ホロイサー」などのかけ声と共に道を歩き、各家はこの声が聞こえたら玄関を開け家族総出で、また、旅館では観光客が出迎える。
sen.e: They walk along the path with the call of 'horoisa,' etc. and on hearing this call, all the family or tourists in a Japanese-style hotel welcome them by opening up the front door.
They walk along the path with the call of 'horoisa,' etc. and on hearing this call, all the family at each house or tourists in a Japanese-style hotel welcome them by opening up the front door.

sen.j: 各家は、餅等を渡して終了となる。
sen.e: Each house hands over rice cakes and other stuffs and this event is terminated.

sen.j: 回り終えたところでグループ毎に漁業協同組合、または船頭の自宅、親戚などにて、貰ったお餅などを分配する。
sen.e: After going-door-to-door, they gather group by group at the fisheries cooperative association or the house of Nanori-sendo boatman or their relative and distribute the rice cakes and other stuffs they collected from each house.

sen.j: 古い注連縄を燃やし、竹竿で魚を釣るような動作で火勢を煽る。
sen.e: Nanori-sendo boatmen burn old Shimenawa and fan the force of the fire in the motion like catching a fish with a bamboo pole.

sen.j: このとき火が高くなればなるほど豊漁になるという。

sen.j: 燃え残った竹竿は残り火は「ジングサンさんへあげる」と唱え海に投げ込む。
sen.e: They throw burned embers of bamboo poles into the sea, saying 'We give them to Jingusan-san.'
